description: Aramaki Daisuke is a strict chief, and is referred to by others in http://anidb.net/ch1590 [Section 9] as the "old ape" (most likely because in the original manga he was drawn with a face that appeared to be half monkey, half man). Even so, he is fiercely loyal to the members of Section 9, and often puts his own career on the line to ensure the survival of the rest of his team.
name: Aramaki Daisuke
